message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $140. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll agree!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm happy to work with you. While $120 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to come up a bit to $125 to make this work.  What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $115 for the product.
